statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, booking_pattern FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference1 = 'Skiing';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, age FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference1 = 'Beach' AND preference2 = 'Spa';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, booking_pattern FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30 AND preference1 = 'Outdoor';
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE booking_pattern->>'date' BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM bookings GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT booking_date, adventure_type, total_amount FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM bookings WHERE adventure_type = 'Hiking');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_bookings FROM bookings GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_bookings > 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, payment_type FROM BookingPatterns ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT package_id, package_name, price FROM AdventurePackages WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT name, age, email FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, preferences FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM AdventurePackages WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, payment_status FROM BookingPatterns WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card' AND payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE age < 25;
SELECT destination_id, location, rating FROM destinations WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT location, activity_type, price FROM destinations WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM bookings JOIN customers ON bookings.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT * FROM destinations JOIN promotions ON destinations.destination_id = promotions.destination_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT booking_date, travel_destination FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_discount FROM promotions WHERE promotion_discount > 0;
SELECT customer_name, activity_preference, travel_style_preference FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;

SELECT customers.customer_name, bookings.booking_date, preferences.activity_preference FROM customers INNER JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.customer_id INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';

SELECT customers.customer_name, promotions.promotion_name, promotions.promotion_discount FROM customers INNER JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.customer_id INNER JOIN bookings_preferences ON bookings.booking_id = bookings_preferences.booking_id INNER JOIN preferences ON bookings_preferences.preference_id = preferences.preference_id INNER JOIN promotions ON preferences.customer_id = promotions.promotion_id;
